dimensions: Warp: 144 cm (56 3/4 in.). Weft: 100 cm (39 1/4 in.) Both selvedges present. Pattern: height of repeat: 101.5 cm (40 in.) Plate visible under the feet of the gentleman with the telescope. Width of plate: 94.5 cm (37 1/4 in.) allowing almost two inches of white space for seams. Designed for lengths so be sewn together as a half-drop repeat.
title: La Demande en Marriage
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
description: Series of scenes involving couples in amorous pleasures in pastoral settings. One scene shows a man kneeling before a woman while two seated older men (presumably the two fathers) watch. This is the scenes which gives the fabric its title. Another scene shows a gentleman looking off into the distance with a telescope while his page dallies with a seated woman. In red on white.
name: Textile
